Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory102.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I heard fireworks!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not bad, Karenina!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh, so you sent Karenina? I'll have to thank her for all her hard work.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Wait... Has anyone seen Nanami?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'She just went out. Maybe she just wants to watch the fireworks.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Maybe. The firework show is about to begin. Can't believe I'm saying it, but I'm a little excited.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Let's go watch!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'With the faint retreat of the wind, the dazzling light shines like the morning star and rushes straight into the sky.'}
{3: 'With a loud bang, it slowly blooms at the edge of the cloud line, marking smooth streaks in the sky.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory104.png'}
{3: 'The steaks blend with each other, and then gradually separate. For a time, the night sky becomes a sea of colorful flowers.'}
{3: "This is the performance brought by Karenina's gunfire."}
{3: 'The beauty at this moment is deeply imprinted in the hearts of everyone present.'}
{3: 'This is their most precious memory and will guide them forward together.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'So, are these... Christmas fireworks?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "They're gorgeous... I'm getting goosebumps!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Me to... It's completely different from the fireworks I remember.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What do you remember, Liv?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Um... It was gorgeous and spectacular, too. But it felt cold and emotionless—just explosions in the sky. One after another...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'At that time, I just stayed at home and watched my brothers and sisters set off fireworks. I imagined what it would be like if I lit fireworks by myself.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The color, shape and bang of fireworks...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So many, many feelings to be conveyed, but no one wanted to...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But now, I feel warm and excited... (Tears up) I don't know how to describe it. When I saw the fireworks spreading across the sky just now, I suddenly felt... so happy.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'That\'s what it\'s like to be with your so-called "family." I think I\'m starting to understand this, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The reason why so many humans cherished Christmas in the past is precisely because they felt connected with the people they care about, so they had a feeling of belonging.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're right, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Huh? I don't understand what the heck you're goin' on about. You're ruinin' the show! Hmph...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're right. Let's just sit back and enjoy the show.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's also interesting to see another side of people you don't normally see.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It feels like I'm not a Construct anymore. I feel like I'm just an ordinary person again. No missions. No battles. No worries...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'That day will come.', 3: '64'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Then my wish will come true.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Whaaat? Wish? Right, right, right! We gotta make a wish on Christmas Eve! My turn!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You're right, Nanami. Back in the day, people would make wishes during special occasions. They'd make wishes, then the bells and fireworks would send their wishes to Santa.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Then Santa Claus would climb down their chimneys while everyone was asleep and secretly put gifts under their Christmas tree. My mother told me this story before.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "If that's the case, why don't you try making a wish, Liv?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'How about we wish upon the fireworks together?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "—Nanami! It won't work if you say it out loud!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Huh? Good grief...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory102.png'}
{3: 'After some time, the firework show ends, and everyone goes back inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Now, it's time for the final phase.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What is it?! What is it?!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Too bad I already know what's about to happen...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You better be excited.', 3: '94', 4: 'The real battle is about to start.', 5: '94'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "W-what? Why's the commandant being so mysterious all of sudden?!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You guessed it—time to exchange gifts!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I wanna gift! I want TONS of gifts! Hehehe... Gimme ALL the gifts!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I think I'm going to have an aneurysm... Right when there was peace and quiet, you start making a fuss again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I don't care! If I don't get any gifts, then I'll cut the Christmas tree to pieces—HMPH!", 4: '2'}
{3: '(Static)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'HEYYYY—! Why do you guys always like starting without me!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We've saved a gift for you, don't worry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't believe a single word you say!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Poor Karenina.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Ha?! To hell with your pity! You were the one who sent me here in the first place!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You've really out down yourself this time. Thank you, Karenina.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Huh? I don't appreciate the condescending attitude...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Enough already. I'm running back as fast as I can. You better wait for me!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "But I'm already on pins and needles waiting to open my gifts!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I think you can hold on a little longer, considering how hard Karenina worked to put on the firework show.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Grrr—(Puffs cheeks in anger)', 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll wait for you.", 3: '131'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You better! I'm getting off the comm. I'll rush over there ASAP...!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia, Lee... You shouldn't bully Karenina, you two.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yeah... you two are bullies! You won't give me gifts! You don't like me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Settle down, Nanami. You won't miss out on any gifts.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hehe, you sure are amazing, Liv.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh? Did I say something wrong?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What Lucia means is, being the star of the show today really suits you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "When someone mentions Christmas gifts, I'm sure you think of the old man with a white beard—Santa Claus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "He's in charge of delivery Christmas gifts all over the world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Unfortunately, Santa won't be visiting us... More precisely, we couldn't afford one...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Luckily, we have the commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Um... I'm Santa?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What are you talking about, Lee? Is your frame overheating again?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Who's idea do you think it was to have this Christmas celebration? Without the commandant's support, we wouldn't be here today.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'And the name of this battle is—"Operation Celebrate Christmas to Cheer Up Liv"—so our host is liv.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh?! I just saw how hard everyone was working and wanted...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That may be so, but the commandant has been worried about you. That's why we held this Christmas celebration.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "In other words, this Christmas celebration is the commandant's gift to you, Liv.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "So, shouldn't Liv return the gesture with a special gift?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't you have anything, Liv?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Well, this is a disaster...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'How could I forget! A gift... Yes, I have one... But...', 4: '2'}
{2: "I'm happy with whatever you give me, Liv.", 3: '180'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But... Commandant...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It means a lot to give a gift to someone you care about on Christmas.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hmm... I think I remember Liv's gift... Oh, right! It's AMAZING—!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Na-Nanami! Don't spoil the surprise! But first, I want to know what kind of gift the commandant wants...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The commandant\'s just going to say, "I\'m happy with whatever you give me"...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're right. What's the point in that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How about a picture to remember our first Christmas together?', 3: '193'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...A picture? That's it?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Rationally speaking, the commander's choice is obviously well thought out... No, it can be said that it's the perfect choice.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "A group photo can be taken with you and kept for a long time. Whether you're eating, sleeping, or going to the battlefield, it's a precious amulet you can always have with you to keep you in high spirits.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I really didn't put that much thought into it...", 3: '202'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Now we just need to decide where to take the picture. I don't think there's a more suitable place than here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why do you get to decide for me?!', 3: '204'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Well, considering the effort we put into transforming this into a Christmas cabin...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant... I'll try my best..!", 4: '2'}
